mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(id, userId, password, name, role) VALUES((select ifnull(max(id),0)+1 from user u),#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET PASSWORD=#{password}, NAME=#{name}, ROLE=#{role} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER WHERE USERID=#{userId} AND PASSWORD=#{password}
